entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:40 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
